column5: Hi everyone ,  I am a new hand for fishing . Does anyone can teach me fishing salmon in small river  or brook in fall. I really like fishing.  Thanks
You need to provide more information about yourself.. where what river etc..  Casting Cleo spoones off the peir in the fall is always a start
Lex,dont forget the might powerful Marshmello.  First post there friend. Please introduce yerself.  You love fishing.What kind of fishing?   Oh and WELCOME.

Thank misfish and Lex. I am new one and my name is Yan. I live at Brampton . I always see sombody fising at credit river. I am a new for fishing and I am going to learn how to fishing. It is my pleasure  I can become  your firend. Thanks

as easy as a 6'6 foot-10 foot rod medium action.8-14 pound test(depends where you are fishing) a good spinning reel...if you are fishing in river/creeks you can get cheap rods and reel combo for $ 60 or more.the bait you can use is roe,marshemellows,worms,plastic worms/eggs, etc if pier fishing casting spoons is common and having egg sacks with float styrophome in them and used on the bottom

Welcome Yan.  For a your first time salmon fishing, better too cast spoons, flatfish, wigglers.  Best time too do this is late Aug into mid Sept. It gets busy out there so arrive early  Fishing in with baits is also fun but requires a little more skil riggigng, hookset etcl. You can use the hook up section here too see if you can join someone going to teach you the finer points.  Stay safe and post results
Cleos(blue/silve)r.Smooth or hammered finish. Also chartuse cocs.  Can people still fish off the texaco rocks at port vredit? If so,thats a great place.
